Verify the 'Share' button has a scale transformation of 1.1 on hover
Trigger a confirmation dialog on 'https://dashboard.example.com/delete-item'
Verify the modal dialog is visible, centered horizontally and vertically, with background color #FFFFFF and max width 500px
Ensure its box shadow is '0px 0px 15px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3)'
Check the title 'Confirm Deletion' has font size 22px and color #333333
Confirm the 'Cancel' button has a transparent background and text color #666666
Confirm the 'Delete' button has background #DC3545 and text color #FFFFFF
Verify 'Cancel' and 'Delete' buttons both have padding 12px 20px
Verify the overlay background has rgba(0,0,0,0.5) with z-index 999

Verify the play/pause button is visible, clickable, and has aria-label 'Play video'
Ensure the progress bar has height 8px and background color linear-gradient(#f00, #c00)
Check the volume slider is visible and has a current value of 75%
Confirm the 'Fullscreen' button is present and triggers full screen mode
Verify the video player itself has min width of 640px and max height of 480px in normal view
Check the 'Mute' button shows a speaker icon
Check the 'Mute' button changes its SVG fill color from #FFFFFF to #AAAAAA when muted
Verify the video element has its 'muted' property set to true when muted
Access 'https://admin.portal.com/users'
Verify the table header for 'Username' is clickable and has a cursor pointer
Ensure the sorting indicator arrow (SVG) has a rotate of 180deg when sorted descending
Check that exactly 10 rows are displayed per page, with a row gap of 1px
Confirm the 'Status' column cells display text with font weight 600 for 'Active' and font weight 400 for 'Inactive'
Verify the table has overflow-x auto allowing horizontal scroll on smaller viewports (e.g., 768px)
Verify the table border is 1px solid #DDDDDD
Open 'https://photos.site.com/gallery/travel'
Confirm the main carousel image is visible, 800px wide
Confirm its source changes within 800ms upon clicking navigation arrows
Verify the 'Next' arrow button is clickable and has SVG stroke #333333
Check that the image counter displays '3 of 10' and is centered at the bottom of the carousel
Ensure the current image has a transition effect 'opacity 0.5s ease-in-out' when switching
Verify the small thumbnail previews are 100px wide
Verify thumbnail previews have an opacity of 0.6 when not selected, becoming 1.0 when active
Open a date picker on 'https://booking.app/reservation'
Verify the date picker dropdown is visible when the input field is focused
Ensure the current month 'October 2023' is displayed in font size 18px
Check that selectable days have a background color #E6F3FF on hover
Check that selectable days have a border radius 50% when selected
Confirm that disabled dates (past dates) have an opacity of 0.4 and are not clickable
Verify the 'Today' button is enabled and has text color #007BFF
Verify the entire date picker component has a max height of 350px
Access 'https://cloud.storage.com/upload'
Verify the drag-and-drop area is visible
Verify the drag-and-drop area has a dashed border 2px dashed #007BFF when active
Verify the drag-and-drop area displays text 'Drop files here or click to upload'
Ensure the 'Browse Files' button has background color #007BFF and text color #FFFFFF, with padding 12px 25px
Check that a file list displays the count of uploaded files as '3 files uploaded'
Confirm that each uploaded file entry has a 'Delete' icon (SVG) with fill #DC3545
Verify the progress bar for an ongoing upload should be visible and report a value of 75% for 'upload_doc.pdf'
Submit an empty form on 'https://register.example.com/signup'
Verify the 'Email address' input field displays a red border 2px solid #DC3545
Verify an error message 'Email is required.' appears below the 'Email address' input field
Ensure the error message text has font size 14px and color #DC3545
Check that the 'Password' field also displays a red border 2px solid #DC3545
Check that an error message 'Password must be at least 8 characters.' appears below the 'Password' field
Confirm the 'Register' button remains enabled but changes its background color to #A9A9A9 until all errors are resolved
Verify the main error summary container appears at the top, with background color #F8D7DA and text color #721C24
Trigger a success notification on 'https://app.example.com/dashboard'
Verify the toast message appears at the top-right corner, is visible for 5 seconds, and has background color #28A745
Ensure its border radius is 5px and it has box shadow '0px 2px 5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2)'
Check the message text 'Item successfully saved.' is displayed with font size 16px and color #FFFFFF
Confirm a 'Close' icon (SVG) is present, clickable
Confirm the 'Close' icon causes the toast to hide with an animation duration of 300ms
Verify the toast has an offset top of 20px and offset right of 20px
Initiate a data load on 'https://data.reporting.com/report'
Verify the linear progress bar is visible, spans 100% of its parent container width
Verify the linear progress bar animates from 0% to 100% within 2 seconds
Ensure the bar's filled portion has background color #007BFF and height 10px
Check the percentage text 'Loading 75%' is displayed below the bar, centered, with font size 14px
Confirm the loader animation uses a cubic-bezier(0.65, 0.05, 0.36, 1) timing function
Verify the progress bar has a z-index of 500 above other content

Check that the article headlines stack vertically with a margin-bottom 15px

Confirm the sidebar column is hidden (display none)
Verify the footer element's text alignment is center at this viewport width

Ensure its text content is 'Unique identifier for the product.' with font size 12px and color #FFFFFF
Check the tooltip has a border radius of 4px and a max width of 200px

Check that keywords like 'function' are highlighted with color #FFC66D
Check that strings like 'Hello, world!' are highlighted with color #A5C261
Confirm the code block has padding 15px and overflow-x auto for horizontal scrolling
